sourcesContent:
<template>
    <add-form @createOrUpdate="createOrUpdate"></add-form>
</template>
<script>
import AdminAdd from '../components/AdminAdd.vue'
import { api } from '../helpers/Helpers.js'

export default {
    name: "admin-page",
    components: {
        'add-form':AdminAdd
    },
    methods:{
        createOrUpdate: async function(item){
            if(item.id){
                await api.put(`/api/cameras/${item.id}`, item);
            }else{
                await api.post('/api/cameras', item);
            }
            this.$router.push('/home/page');
        }
    }

}
</script>
<style scoped>
</style>
